Judul: ANALISA PUBLIKASI POSITIF TERHADAP JUMLAH PELAMAR KERJA DI PERUSAHAAN TEKNOLOGI FINANSIAL
Abstrak:
Nowadays, technology is developing rapidly, representing Indonesia's growing number of internet users yearly (Burhan, 2021). The evolution of digital media and internet usage influence the financial literacy of fintech application users among millennials (LM Sarengat & Mahadwartha, 2021). The emergence of many technology companies formed a talent war for people with STEM and digital background between these companies to attract talents in the market. Since Ajaib Group attained Unicorn status, it has experienced hyper-growth and ought to grow its workforce to sustain the business. Nonetheless, not many are familiar with the working environment at Ajaib Group. Likewise, if it occurs for a longer period, it will slow down its growth in the long run.
The writer would like to analyze the impact of positive employer brand publicity on the applicants' number to fulfil the hiring needs in a financial technology company. This further can help the company strategize its employer brand better and accelerate its hiring and growth. To support the research analysis, the writer used existing theories on the employer brand and its digital implementation. The research method used is qualitative research through interviews with the existing employees at Ajaib Group who have worked for at least three months and the recruiters at Ajaib group. Three questions navigated the research: (1) What factors influence people to apply for jobs at Ajaib Group? (2) What type of publicity and which channel is most effective in attracting potential candidates? (3) What is the correlation between positive employer brand publicity and the desire to apply to a financial technology company?
The results displayed that exposing candidates to positive publicity will charm them to apply to the Ajaib Group. Some factors that influence them are Positive Business Outlook, Brand Reputation & Publicity, Career and Personal Progression Opportunity, Environment and quality of work, Monetary & Non-Monetary benefits, and Leaders. The most-used channel to find information about the company is social media such as LinkedIn, Glassdoor and Instagram. Additionally, the candidates will find information on Google; hence maintaining good google research is something the company should consider. This research can conclude that positive publicity can provide better awareness for Ajaib Group, influence more people to join, and provide a higher talent pool for recruitment. The discoveries from this research have implications for both the HR and Marketing fields, contributing to the growing employer brand literature.
